name: Psychological Warfare in Social Media
description: Training in countering, manipulating, and neutralizing psychological operations executed through social media platforms.

cards.title: Identifying Social Media Psychological Operations
cards.description: Recognizing tactics used in large-scale digital influence campaigns.
bulletpoints: Detecting the use of emotion-driven propaganda and fear tactics.
Analyzing content patterns to uncover coordinated manipulation.
Understanding how botnets and AI-driven accounts amplify narratives.
cards.summaryText: Spot engineered emotion spikes, trace coordinated patterns, and flag bot amplification before narratives stick.

cards.title: Algorithmic Manipulation and Censorship Warfare
cards.description: Understanding how algorithms shape digital narratives and influence behavior.
bulletpoints: Decoding content suppression and algorithmic throttling strategies.
Tracking how recommendation engines amplify specific agendas.
Bypassing algorithmic control mechanisms using decentralized techniques.
cards.summaryText: Decode throttling tactics, monitor agenda boosts, and route around censors with decentralized channels.

cards.title: Mass Persuasion Techniques in Social Media Warfare
cards.description: Leveraging psychological principles to manipulate or counteract narratives.
bulletpoints: Applying cognitive bias exploitation for maximum audience impact.
Using anchoring, repetition, and social proof to control discourse.
Understanding meme warfare and its role in psychological influence.
cards.summaryText: Exploit biases, anchor key messages, and wield memes to steer or counter mass persuasion.

cards.title: Countering Disinformation Campaigns
cards.description: Developing techniques to detect, expose, and neutralize digital disinformation.
bulletpoints: Tracing disinformation sources to uncover influence networks.
Disrupting narrative control through real-time fact-checking tactics.
Deploying counter-propaganda strategies to neutralize misinformation.
cards.summaryText: Trace origin nodes, surface truth fast, and counter with narratives that collapse disinfo runs.

cards.title: Weaponized Fear and Outrage in Social Media
cards.description: Recognizing and counteracting tactics that exploit fear, outrage, and division.
bulletpoints: Identifying emotional triggers embedded in viral narratives.
Neutralizing fear-based messaging through psychological inoculation.
Deploying calming and rational counter-narratives to reduce polarization.
cards.summaryText: Identify emotional triggers, inoculate audiences, and respond with calm framing to dissolve outrage ops.

cards.title: Coordinating Digital Counter-Offensives

Amplifying strategic narratives to shift public perception.
Utilizing swarm intelligence to counteract mass manipulation efforts.

cards.title: Infiltrating and Disrupting Enemy Influence Networks
cards.description: Engaging in counter-infiltration tactics to neutralize hostile digital actors.
bulletpoints: Creating controlled opposition accounts to manipulate discourse.
Leveraging sock puppet networks to influence adversarial communities.
Subverting enemy propaganda by injecting destabilizing counter-narratives.

cards.title: Social Engineering Attacks in Psychological Warfare
cards.description: Defending against manipulative tactics used to alter perception and behavior.

cards.title: Psychological Resilience Against Digital PsyOps

bulletpoints: Developing pattern recognition to detect deceptive narratives.
Training cognitive autonomy to resist external influence.
Using behavioral reinforcement techniques to maintain resistance.

cards.title: Building Decentralized Resistance Networks
cards.description: Establishing secure, independent digital communities to resist control mechanisms.
bulletpoints: Using encrypted communication channels to bypass surveillance.
Leveraging decentralized platforms for narrative control and resistance.
Creating redundancy networks to maintain access to information during censorship.
cards.summaryText: Secure communications, leverage decentralized hubs, and maintain redundancy so resistance survives censorship.
